text: Daniel Vachez (3 October 1946 – 15 March 2021) was a French politician. He was born in Lyon. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was Mayor of Noisiel from 1980 to 2017. From 1997 to 2002, he was a member of the National Assembly for Seine-et-Marne's 8th constituency. Vachez died on 15 March 2021 at the age of 74.Noisiel : l’ancien maire Daniel Vachez est décédé == References == Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Lyon
title: Daniel Vachez
